FuncDef: The clear inactive-configuration command clears the inactive configurations.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of an interface board that is not installed.
The value is a string of 1 to 19 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the number of a card that is not installed.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: Warning: The inactive configuration of slot 1 will be deleted and can't be restored.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The clear inactive-configuration command clears the inactive configurations.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
Services are not interrupted during offline configuration deletion. If new boards or subcards are inserted after offline configurations are deleted, you need to add service configurations again.
